Posts.Content: Jan 16, 2012 10:14PM RC1221 wrote: My first chemo treatment was January 12, 2012.  It is now 4 days later and I am starting to feel like myself again. My treatments are every other week -4x, then weekly-12x.  I am already dreading this since my life pre-BC was so active.  I just can't seem to accept this so easily, although I can put up the front that I do.
Posts.Title: January 2012 chemo ely Momof2inME
